This website and the accompanying Attractor Builder add-on were created as part of my work on the visualization and analysis of nonlinear dynamical systems. The aim of the project is to provide clear and accessible tools for performing numerical experiments, studying trajectories, and creating three-dimensional visualizations of attractors directly in Blender. If you have suggestions, improvement ideas, or notice any issues, feel free to reach out â€” the project is open to user feedback.
